participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

FAGERADULT_01.LongName: Have you been a smoker within the past two years?

FAGERADULT_03.LongName: How soon after you wake up do you smoke your first cigarette?

FAGERADULT_04.LongName: Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in the places where it is forbidden (e.g., in church, at the library, in cinema)?

FAGERADULT_05.LongName: Which cigarette would you hate most to give up?

Levels.1: The first one in the morning

FAGERADULT_06.LongName: How many cigarettes/day do you smoke?

FAGERADULT_07.LongName: Do you smoke more frequently during the first hours after waking than during the rest of the day?

FAGERADULT_08.LongName: Do you smoke if you are so ill that you are in bed most of the day?

FAGERADULT_9.Description: Sum of scores from items 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Total scores between 0-2 indicate very low dependence, scores between 3-4 indicate low dependence, score of 5 indicates medium dependence, scores between 6-7 indicate high dependence, and scores between 8-10 indicate very high dependence. | Calculation = [FAGERADULT_03]+[FAGERADULT_04]+[FAGERADULT_05]+[FAGERADULT_06]+[FAGERADULT_07]+[FAGERADULT_08]
